title: 26-year-old Chris Harper Mercer identified as college shooting suspect
text:
Published By: CBS News: U.S. - Yesterday 
Law enforcement sources have identified 26-year-old Chris Harper Mercer as the gunman in a shooting that killed at least 10 at Umpqua Commun...
